name: WHMCS
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: WHMCS is an all-in-one client management, billing & support solution for online businesses.

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<tr><td bgcolor="#efefef" height="20" align="center"><a href="index\.php">Home<\/a> \| <a href="clients\.php">Clients<\/a> \| <a href="supporttickets\.php">Tickets<\/a> \| <a href="orders\.php">Orders<\/a> \| <a href="activitylog\.php">Activity<\/a> \| <a href="logout\.php">Logout<\/a><\/td><\/tr>[\s]+<tr><td align="center">[^,^\s]+, [^<]+<br \/>Version: ([^<^\s]+)<\/td><\/tr>)

matches.text: Got a new license key? Click here to enter it
